questions.question: Considering the overall design, what is the primary style of this footwear?

What color best describes the main body of the sandal, excluding embellishments?
Describe the color of the prominent strap across the foot's top.
What material appears to constitute the sole of the sandal?
Considering the ankle strap's metallic accents, what color is that element?
What shape best defines the overall form of this footwear?
What is the apparent material composition of the thin straps?
Describe the color of the thin strip of material connecting the toe-post to the main strap.
What is the visible design element present on the footbed of the sandal?

What is the primary material composing the sandal's outer sole?
Describe the color of the visible stitching on the footbed of the sandal.
What is the overall structural design of the sandal, in terms of the footbed and sole?
Describe the visible texture of the sandal's insole.
